We enjoyed Salty's so much, we had brunch there 3 times.
It is such a lovely, ambient spot and the way the roof thatch is intertwined with greenery, it casts lovely shaddows across the restaurant.
The staff are lovely.
The smoothies are to die for....We tried a different meal each time and everything was excellent.
We even bought some of the incense sticks as the smell when you enter the restaurant is divine.
Our only crticism is that they do not open for dinner - otherwise we would have visited even mor We tried a different meal each time and everything was excellent.

Our only crticism is that they do not open for dinner - otherwise we would have visited even more!!
A pleasant cafe for laid-back excellent quality and innovative meals that cater for all tastes. Located on the beach side of Galle Road.

Had an absolutely fantastic breakfast on our last morning! Amazing pancakes with bacon for one and egg burger for the other. Smoothies and coffee were great too

Best was the chilled ambience and great decor.

Where good food neets perfection! And absolute delight for the taste buds. Highly recommend diving into their menu for a flavorful experience!

This establishment charges you for using your own bank card to pay for the meal! 
Which I think is ridiculous; given the pricing of the food.
It would be good if they inform you BEFORE the meal that cash is the preferred method of payment.

Such a great spot with a great vibe for a feed and browse of some nice surf apparel and globally recognised surf boards! Left with a full belly and nice board.

Amazing fresh meals! Best spot for breakfast, really relaxed vibe. Friendly staff & gluten free options.
